text: @TerryMoran I saw this post elsewhere and thought you were a GOP-for-all-potus-does-no-wrong guy. This question is unworthy of a major network senior correspondent. The WH should be leading by example, and masks are the precaution against Coronavirus. So yes, it's an *excellent* look.
